fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Victimize: Whenever you attack someone in a phase, gain a random private or negative vote at the end of the phase.
- Deathly Hand: You may play cards when dead if you were EXECUTED.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Victimize: Pick an attack. You will appear to be the player who played that attack. [4 uses]
- Disguise: Pick a player. Choose what role theyâ€™ll appear as for the rest of the phase. [3 uses, 1 CD, Astral].
- Offering: Lose 1 HP. Choose a non-special card to add to your hand. [Infinite uses, 1 CD]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be executed in the Execution event.
